{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = SMC |model = SMC2632W |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = v1 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = |wlclass = B11 |series = |if = PCMCIA (16-bit) |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = |device_id = |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = LLM002WL11000-1 |icid = |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = Harris;HFA3841; |chip2 = Intersil;HFA3861; |chip3 = Intersil;HFA3683A; |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Eumitcom |manuf_model = WL11000 |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = b |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 05/19/2000 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Indonesia, Taiwan |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Some cards (appears to be both v1 and v2) are mislabeled with FCC IDs of LLM002SMC2632W. The correct FCC ID is LLM002WL11000-1. Hardware IDs for the device are as follows.. *PCMCIA\SMC-SMC2632W-AF67 *PCMCIA\SMC-SMC2632W-0156-0002 
Socket 0:
  product info: "SMC", "SMC2632W", "Version 01.02", ""
  manfid: 0x0156, 0x0002
  function: 6 (network)
